mainPageHeading:
Hi, I'm Anil Dabas,
a Frontend Developer
with 5+ years of experience.
introduction: As a passionate and skilled Frontend Developer, I specialize in building dynamic, responsive, and user-centric web applications. With over five years of experience in frontend development, I have honed my skills in React, Next.js, and TypeScript, among other technologies. My work focuses on crafting efficient, scalable, and performant solutions that enhance user experiences while ensuring technical excellence. I thrive on solving complex problems, constantly learning, and staying up to date with the latest advancements in web development to deliver top-notch applications.
educationIntroduction: I hold a Bachelor of Technology in Information Technology from USICT, Delhi, India, which has laid a solid foundation for my technical expertise and problem-solving approach.
